list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of material extended on a mast to catch the wind and propel a boat or ship or other vessel.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: tất cả những cánh buồm đều được tung lên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a wind-catching apparatus, typically one consisting of canvas or a set of boards, attached to the arm of a windmill.
a voyage or excursion in a ship, especially a sailing ship or boat.
the conning tower of a submarine.
travel in a boat with sails, especially as a sport or recreation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Ian took us out sailing on the lake
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ian đưa chúng tôi ra khỏi hồ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move smoothly and rapidly or in a stately or confident manner.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she sailed into the conference room at 2:30 sharp
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đi thuyền vào phòng hội nghị lúc 2:30
